_comment: TEMPLATE FILE - Replace placeholder key values with actual PII

birth_dates._comment: YYYY-MM-DD - the script will also redact other ways this date can be written (e.g. 2000-11-12 might be 12th November, 2000)

phones._comment: Phone numbers: Script extracts final 10 digits and redacts them everywhere (catches both 07700900123 and +447700900123 formats)
